description.narrative: The project development objective is to promote the adoption of environmentally sustainable technologies in agri-businesses.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Contrato de Mandato | Description :Contrato de Mandato | Due Date :01-Mar-2007

title.narrative: Number of agri-businesses having adopted low carbon intensity technologies
Number of Inter-ministerial workshops promoting collaboration and knowledge sharing on climate change activities related to the project carried out

Number of small and medium-sized agri-businesses adopting environmentally sustainable technologies (renewable energy, energy efficient technologies, sustainable waste management or biomass conversion)
Number of energy efficiency and /or renewable energy sub-projects received technical assistance on energy efficiency and/or renewable energy technologies during implementation
Number of MWH energy is produced by biomass and corresponding tons of CO2 e emissions avoided
Number of KWh of energy saved from adoption of energy efficient technologies and corresponding tons of avoided CO2 e emissions
Number of SAGARPA/FIRCO staff that participated in training events organized by the project
Number of pilot projects carried out to demonstrate and validate other technological innovations that could be proposed under the project
Number of agri-business employees/processors has participated in training events organized by the project
Planning process followed as defined in the Operations Manual describing when and how Annual Implementation Plans (AIP) and quarterly and monthly plans prepared based on Project Implementation Plan

baseline.value: AIP prepared and submitted to the Bank

target.value: AIP prepared and submitted to the Bank

actual.value: AIP prepared and submitted to the Bank

title.narrative: A unit within SAGARPA is established to support and/or to formulate, implement and monitor Climate Change mitigation and adaptationpolicies and programs in agriculture sector

target.value: The unit is established and functioning

actual.value: The unit is established and functioning

title.narrative: SAGARPA is successfully formulating climate change mitigation and adaptation policies and programs in the agricultural sector and monitoring their implementation
Quarterly physical and financial status reports prepared and submitted to the Bank
Semi-annual documents on lessons learned and policy implications are prepared. To coincide with supervision missions
